title: Thanks Riot :D
body:
No complaints, no arguments. No points to make. Riot just gifted me a summoner icon with the message 'Thank You', so Thank you too riot :D





{{champion:127}}

replies.body: i got the icon but i got except for alpha on the day it ended seems weird but a free icon is a free icon :D
Its the Icon for having a Geez at the pre-release of the new client. It's actually not a bad Icon. I like how it looks
